summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Union Street, in the City of Seattle, from Twenty-fifth Avenue to Thirtieth Avenue, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 668 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
